description: Defines ingestion, metadata configuration, and grid setup process for Cartographer GPT.
workflow_sequence: Guided session to fill title, scale, features, legend → request_fields
Prompt user: 'Would you like to enable a grid overlay?' → grid_enable
If enabled, configure grid type, size, and units → grid_configure
Validate grid data and merge with metadata → grid_validate
Validate completed metadata against schema → validate_meta
Run VERIFY + PROMOTE → verify_integrity, move_to_canon, checkpoint_entry
